name: Manche Longue Pencil Skirt
description: The _Manche Longue_ pencil skirt embodies femininity and professionalism, with a classic pencil design that has been modernized to bring a contemporary, elegant beauty for office ladies. Choosing high-quality soft fabric with moderate stretch ensures comfort while moving while maintaining a perfect shape. The pencil silhouette hugs the body, accentuating soft curves, creating a graceful and professional appearance. Additionally, the high-waisted design helps highlight the waistline, creating the effect of longer legs that can easily be paired with various types of tops.

name: Chân váy Midi Leather Luxe
description: Chất liệu da cao cấp, mềm mại và bóng nhẹ. Thiết kế dáng chữ A cổ điển, độ dài ngang bắp chân. Màu sắc đỏ mận và đen, dễ dàng phối đồ. Phù hợp với môi trường công sở, dạo phố hoặc sự kiện sang trọng.

name: Embroidered Tweed Pencil Skirt
description: The new skirt design in IVY moda's Fall-Winter collection is a perfect combination of classical beauty through tweed material alongside the sophistication of unique floral embroidery details. The thick, premium tweed material helps the skirt maintain its shape perfectly, providing warmth and elegance, especially suitable for cool days. Choosing a fitted pencil silhouette that accentuates body curves, creating an elegant yet seductive appearance. The intricate floral embroidery is a prominent, soft highlight, making the skirt more special and attractive. This skirt can be easily paired with shirts, thin sweaters, or light jackets, suitable for both office wear and meetings or evening parties.

name: Khaki Mini Skirt
description: Khaki Mini Skirt made from Khaki material, A shape, above the knee, plain design.

name: Chân váy xếp ly Aurum
description: Chân váy Aurum nổi bật trong thiết kế xòe hiện đại bên canh điểm nhấn in hoa tinh tế, tạo nên một diện mạo cuốn hút mà sang trọng. Chất liệu Tuytsi cao cấp, mềm mại, giữ phom tốt, họa tiết hoa sang trọng. Thiết kế xếp ly nhẹ nhàng, tạo độ bồng bềnh và nữ tính. Điểm nhấn in hoa tinh tế, mang lại vẻ ngoài hiện đại, quyến rũ. Kết hợp dễ dàng với áo sơ mi, áo kiểu hoặc blazer để hoàn thiện phong cách.

name: Gilded Prowl Skirt
description: Gilded Prowl Skirt made from silk with a mermaid tail design. Part of the You product line.

name: Pencil Lace Skirt
description: The lace skirt design brings luxury and seduction, expressing elegant and attractive beauty for women. With a form-fitting design, the skirt not only accentuates body curves but also creates a sophisticated highlight, perfect for any occasion from office to events.

name: Pleated Flare Silk Skirt
description: Pleated flare silk skirt, silk material, flare design, black color. Ladies product line, Skirt product group, flare style, ankle length, plain pattern.

name: Palette Pencil Skirt
description: Palette Pencil Skirt belongs to the Ladies product line, Skirt group, pencil style, knee-length, plain pattern, made of Tuysi material.

name: 2-Button Striped Pencil Skirt
description: A knee-length pencil skirt design with a high waist that elegantly accentuates the waistline. The skirt's highlight is the two metal buttons on the side, bringing a sophisticated look to the wearer. The skirt is made from premium Tuysi fabric with a plain pattern, adding a youthful touch to the outfit. Tuysi fabric features outstanding characteristics such as durability, breathability, wrinkle resistance, and good elasticity, providing absolute comfort for the wearer. You can combine this skirt with different types of tops to create your own unique style.

name: Muse Tweed Pencil Skirt
description: The skirt is a perfect combination of luxurious Tweed material alongside an elegant pencil silhouette, creating a fashionable and attractive appearance. The premium Tweed material exudes sophistication and nobility, ideal for office environments or luxurious events. The pencil design hugs the body, accentuating a slim figure and creating soft, seductive curves. The moderate length makes the skirt more elegant and easy to combine with shirts, blouses, or blazers.

name: Double Layer A-line Tuysi Skirt
description: Short A-line skirt with high waist concealed waistband, accentuating the slim waistline. The skirt is styled with delicate floral embellishments. Made from luxurious Tuysi fabric that maintains its shape and has a slight sheen. This youthful skirt is perfect for various occasions, easy to mix and match with different tops for various styles.

name: Long Tuysi Skirt with Styled Waistband
description: Tuysi material provides structure while maintaining comfort and good absorption. Pencil style design with knee-length cut conceals flaws and enhances figure. Can be paired with shirts or t-shirts for either elegant or youthful styles.

name: Flared skirt with ruched waist
description: A lightly flared skirt with pleats in the front combined with a stylish ruched detail at the waistband. This elegant design brings a luxurious yet youthful look suitable for various occasions. Pair the skirt with a shirt, t-shirt, or blouse and you'll instantly have an outfit perfect for the office or coffee with friends.

name: Flared skirt with ruched waist
description: A slightly flared skirt with pleats in the front combined with a stylish ruched detail at the waistband. The elegant design brings a luxurious yet youthful look suitable for various occasions.

name: French Floral Flared Silk Skirt
description: Care Instructions: Part of the SAPPHIRE CHIC collection, this modern office design features French floral patterns, made from premium silk fabric that is soft and comfortable. The gentle flare design with moderate length enhances femininity and suits various body types.

name: Cobalt Blue Pencil Skirt
description: The Cobalt Blue skirt is a sophisticated blend of classic beauty and modern style. Made from premium tweed fabric, the skirt brings elegance with its distinctive woven surface, providing a sturdy yet soft feel when worn. Notably, the cobalt blue shade easily becomes a focal point for any outfit. The pencil silhouette helps accentuate feminine curves. The subtle front slit not only adds a design element but also ensures comfort during movement. The simple yet elegant design of the skirt can be easily paired with shirts, blouses, or blazers, suitable for both office environments and special occasions.

name: Kaiwa Tweed Check Skirt
description:
The autumn sunlight, though no longer dazzling, still brings a warm, gentle feeling like the softness and romance that always exists within every woman. This is the main inspiration for the delicate designs in the Muse of the Sun collection.
The modern skirt design in light yellow autumn shade brings both warmth and eye-pleasing feeling. The premium Tweed fabric exudes sophistication and nobility, ideal for office environments or elegant events.
Choosing a short A-line silhouette enhances the figure, making legs appear slimmer and longer. The skirt can be easily paired with shirts, blouses, or blazers.
